ingredients: 2 pound(s) uncooked boneless skinless chicken breast(s)
30 oz canned black beans, rinsed and drained
2 cup(s) reduced-fat shredded Monterey Jack cheese, or Mexican-style cheese blend
8 oz chopped green chili(es), two 4-oz cans
12 medium corn tortilla(s), cut into 2-inch strips
1 cup(s) fat free salsa, mild, medium or hot
